channel.title: termination on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in termination on Barefoot Rob

item.title: Vimeo terminated my PRO account
item.description: Good morning! I got a surprise from Vimeo this morning. Dear Rob Nugen, Your account has been removed by the Vimeo Staff for violating our Guidelines. Reason: You cannot upload rips of movies, music, television, viral videos, or any other content that you did not create. For more information on our content and community policies, please visit: https://vimeo.com/guidelines. If you believe this was an error, please reply to this message as soon as possible to explain.
